column2: X X ran from staff after not returning to the classroom from the PAS room as expected. She and another student ran out of the building but she came back inside but continued to be non-compliant for about an hour. Once back in the classroom she and began throwing classroom items at staff and trashed the room. She was escorted to a calming area but eloped and ran outside where she was unsafe and threw a rock at a staff members car. She was escorted back inside but refused to get on her bus so she was in a calming 10/20/20 12:02 PM room until she could be picked up.
X was upset at another classmate
column3: she ran from the room and was aggressive towards staff in the calming area. She was hitting
column4: kicking and biting staff. When she calmed down she called and spoke to 11/3/2012:15 PM Grandma
column5: and was able to return to class.
